titles.title: A bill to allow the obsolete submarine U.S.S. Turbot to be transferred to Dade County, Florida.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Projection Forces and Regional.
Committee on Armed Services requested executive comment from Defense Department.

bill.summary: 9/16/1987--Introduced. Allows the obsolete submarine U.S.S. Turbot to be transferred to Dade County, Florida, before the expiration of the otherwise applicable 60-day congressional review period.
